mapper.select: select userid, mileage, breakdown, to_char(occurence_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') occurence_date from mileage where userid='${userid}'
select sum(mileage) from mileage where userid='${userid}'
select sum(mileage) from mileage where userid='${userid}' and sign(mileage)=1
select sum(mileage) from mileage where userid='${userid}' and sign(mileage)=-1
